name: Lost on an Alien World
description:
Fight your way off an alien world in this single-screen roguelike prototype from Milkbag Games. Complete 10 Floors to survive the Alien World.

Lost on an Alien World is a prototype. We'd love to get your feedback on what you liked/disliked about the game.

Controls (Mouse & Keyboard):

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left-Click - Fire Weapon
Right-Click - Use Ability
R - Reload
E - Interact

ESC / P - Pause
M - Music Toggle
N - SFX Toggle
F5 - Restart
ALT+F4 - Quit
